name: The Executioner (itch) (Gamedev Teacher)
description:
This game was made with Unreal Engine 4 in a week for a Tiki Game Jam by 6 people. The theme of the jam was: "Long live the king!!!".

Synopsis :

You are THE official executioner of the royal family from father to son : "Le corps naturel meurt mais la fonction demeure."

In recent months the king's authority has been marred by rebellious insurrections against the order of the crown.

To cut this rebellion short it will be necessary to cut off heads...or burn them to a crisp for a 3 star rebel roast, or dilute them in a bath of acid to loosen the rebel meat.

Be careful to execute the orders of the king and the rebels correctly.

And maybe you'll become the king...of executioners.

The team was composed of these 6 wizards :

  • L3R13UR : Game Designer
  • Kyubi : Character Artist
  • Rob : Environment Artist
  • Skidzo : Unreal Engine Generalist
  • MasBass : Music and Sound Design
  • Gamedev Teacher : Unreal Engine Generalist
